author: Karla Smith
title: XBOSOFT CEO Philip Lew to deliver keynote at SQTM in San Diego
text:
Philip Lew, CEO of XBOSoft, will be keynote speaker at the SQTM conference in San Diego on September 16, 2015. The software quality and test management event runs September 13-18 at the Sheraton San Diego Hotel & Marina. Mobile has taken center stage in our daily lives. The world has become increasingly connected as we promote and permit, knowingly or not, via social networking – all made possible because of the now global prevalence of the smartphone. When current mobile devices become obsolete in less than a year and OS's continually add new functions and features with each release, it becomes even more critical to understand not only current trends but also what will be coming tomorrow. Philip Lew’s keynote address, Software Testing and QA in a Mobile Dominated World, will explore the implications of current and emerging mobile trends for software testers and quality engineers, including questions of design, test cases, mobile applications, and how to adapt in order to stay ahead of the competition.
SQTM focuses on advancing the test management and quality management professions by providing practical methods based on best practices. The conference is dedicated to helping all levels of management to adopt methods, technologies, and practices that increase productivity and produces higher quality systems. Additional information about the conference can be found at http://qualitymanagementconference.com/index.php
About Philip Lew
After working in various management and technical positions in software development and product management, Philip Lew leads XBOSoft’s direction and strategy as CEO. A speaker at numerous trade and academic conferences, Phil has worked with hundreds of organizations to assess the quality of their software, examine software quality processes, and set forth measurement plans to improve software quality using systematic methods. His Ph.D. research in software quality and usability resulted in several IEEE and ACM journal publications and various trade journals.
About XBOSoft
XBOSoft is a software testing and QA company. Our quality process assessments and test methodologies speed products to market and improve our clients’ software quality and performance throughout the lifecycle. With QA services in web, mobile and desktop applications, we offer broad domain experience with extended expertise in healthcare and finance.
Founded in 2006, XBOSoft today has over 100 employees serving both the US and European markets, with offices based in San Francisco, Beijing and Amsterdam.
For more information, visit http://xbosoft.com
